src:
Agen Upayakan Transfer Robert Lewandowski ke Real Madrid
04 Nov 2019, 21:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Rumor bergabungnya Robert Lewandowski ke Real Madrid kembali menyeruak. Agen striker Bayern Munchen itu diberitakan tengah mengupayakan transfer sang striker ke Spanyol.
Selama lima tahun terakhir, Lewandowski dikenal sebagai salah satu striker haus gol di Eropa. Sang striker selalu stabil menjadi mesin gol yang mematikan untuk Bayern Munchen.
Lewandowski sendiri kerap dihubungkan dengan Real Madrid. Klub asal Ibukota Spanyol itu kerap mencoba untuk merekrut penyerang Polandia itu, namun selalu menemui kegagalan.
Namun Don Balon mengklaim bahwa sang striker sangat tertarik untuk pindah ke Real Madrid. Ia dikabarkan meminta sang agen untuk mewujudkan transfer tersebut.

Mengapa Lewandowski ingin pindah? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
Agent Efforts to Transfer Robert Lewandowski to Real Madrid
Nov 04 2019, 21:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Rumors of Robert Lewandowski's joining Real Madrid are back. Bayern Munich striker agent was reportedly working on the striker's transfer to Spain.
Over the past five years, Lewandowski is known as one of the goal-hungry strikers in Europe. The striker has always been a stable goal machine for Bayern Munich.
Lewandowski himself is often associated with Real Madrid. The club from the Spanish capital often tries to recruit the Polish striker, but always fails.
But Don Balon claims that the striker is very interested in moving to Real Madrid. He reportedly asked the agent to realize the transfer.

Why does Lewandowski want to move? Check out the information below.
